experiences.title: Solution Developer
desc: Worked with team and also managed team to develop a web application for a clients: Tata Steel, Godrej, Jaguar Land Rover and Kia Motors.
Worked as a full stack developer and developed a web application using React, Express and MongoDB.
Also have hands on experience in developing a mobile application using React Native.
Worked on various projects and also have hands on experience in AWS and Azure.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
desc: Worked as a React Developer and developed a web application using React And Redux.
Also got to learn about Tailwind CSS and Material UI.
Worked under the guidance of senior developers and also got to learn about the industry standards.
Our Major client was GitHub and we developed a web application for them.

experiences.title: Owner
desc: Managed a team of 5 people and developed with Agile Methodology.
It currently has 200K users and is growing rapidly.
We earned through ads and also through premium subscription.
Technologies used: React, Express, MongoDB, Firebase, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud.
